full_summary:
# Call for Proposals TS9 - Innovative Solutions Canada - Testing Stream

## Summary
The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) issues a Call for Proposals (CFP) on behalf of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) and participating departments. This solicitation, amended by TS9, aims to procure, test, and evaluate pre-commercialized goods and services in the late stage development (Technology Readiness Level (TRL) 7 to 9) as part of the Innovations Solutions Canada Program - Testing Stream (ISC TS).

## Requirements
ISED is seeking solutions to address multiple Problem Statements and Topics outlined on the ISC website Open Funding Opportunities page. Suppliers will be conditionally qualified to address Government of Canada organizations’ requirements. Qualification does not guarantee a contract award.

## Solicitation Period
The solicitation period begins on September 12th, 2023, and closes on October 3rd, 2023.

## Procurement
This procurement is set-aside under the Small Business Set-Aside criterion, which requires the Bidder to be a for-profit entity with 499 or fewer full-time equivalent (FTE) employees. The Bidder must also meet the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business requirements.

## Funding
The estimated maximum funding available for all contracts resulting from this solicitation is $69.5 million CAD.

## Contract Award Process
The Contract Award Process will continue even if fiscal funding is no longer available. Proposals under contract negotiations will take priority when funding is available.

## Important Dates

*   Solicitation Period: September 12th, 2023 - October 3rd, 2023
*   Notice Closing Date: October 3rd, 2023
*   Contract Award Process: Separately scheduled

## Contact Information
For all enquiries, please contact:

## Additional Information
Please refer to the solicitation documents for additional information on proposal preparation, evaluation procedures, basis of selection, and other pertinent details.
